vlive.korean: 아니, 아니에요 이유를 같이 설명해주시면... No, no. Just want to know why... 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: No, no. Just want to know why...

vlive.korean: 그래서 여러분들 저희 7명이 모인 이유가 뭘까요? Why do you think 7 of us are together now? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [GOT7] 눈 덩어리보다 더 반가운 덩어리들,, 아이러브유💚 (GOT7’s acrostic poem bet)
vlive.english: Why do you think 7 of us are together now?

vlive.korean: 내가 늦은 이유가 있어 제이홉! 생일 축하해! There's a reason I'm late j-hope! Happy birthday! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 공공칠빵 소시지빵은 가라 호석오빵의 시대가 왔노라니,,🍞 (HAPPY J-HOPE DAY+1!)
vlive.english: There's a reason I'm late j-hope! Happy birthday!

vlive.korean: 여러분, 정국 씨가 저를 뽑았는데 이유를 들어봐도 될까요? Everyone, Jung Kook picked me. Can we hear why? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: Everyone, Jung Kook picked me. Can we hear why?

vlive.korean: 그러게요? - 이유 말씀해주시죠 - 그게 아니라 - 이유가 있을까요? Yeah. - Please tell us why. - No, I meant... - Is there a reason? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: Yeah. - Please tell us why. - No, I meant... - Is there a reason?

examples.korean: The referee warned him for dangerous play. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 심판이 난폭 경기를 이유로 그에게 경고를 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The referee warned him for dangerous play. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She left the room abruptly without explanation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 아무 이유[설명] 없이 갑자기 방을 나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She left the room abruptly without explanation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We all speculated about the reasons for her resignation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 모두 그녀의 사직 이유를 짐작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We all speculated about the reasons for her resignation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The ostensible reason for his absence was illness. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 불참한 표면적인 이유는 병이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ostensible reason for his absence was illness. Add to Wordbook
